summary: "To Pimp a Butterfly" is Kendrick Lamar's third album, released in 2015. It combines hip-hop with jazz, funk, and soul, and tackles important topics like racial inequality and African-American culture. Many famous musicians helped make the album, and it became very popular, selling over a million copies in the U.S. and winning a Grammy for Best Rap Album. Critics loved it, calling it one of the best albums of the 2010s.
title: To Pimp a Butterfly
